Uses of Class
jrtr.VertexData

  • Packages that use VertexData 
    Package Description
    jrtr
    A simple API to build 3D rendering applications.
    jrtr.glrenderer
    An standard OpenGL renderer implementing the jrtr interfaces.
    jrtr.swrenderer
    An renderer based on software rasterization implementing the jrtr interfaces.
    simple
    A simple 3D graphics application using the jrtr library for 3D rendering.

    • Uses of VertexData in jrtr.glrenderer

      Subclasses of VertexData in jrtr.glrenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GLVertexData
      An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.
